DOC.detailed_description: This non-randomized , prospective , multi-center safety device success study . Up two hundred ( 200 ) patient plan implanted 35 participate investigational center Europe , Australia New Zealand . Patient participation last minimum 5 year . Patients assess follow interval : baseline , discharge , 30 day , 6 month , 1 year annually thereafter 5 year .
